name: Upul Tharanga
bio: Warushavithana Upul Tharanga (born 2 February 1985), commonly known as Upul Tharanga (Sinhala: උපුල් තරංග), is a former professional Sri Lankan cricketer, and a former limited over captain[1] who played for all formats of the game. He is a left-handed opening batsman and occasional wicket-keeper. On 23 February 2021, Upul announced his retirement from international cricket.[2]
